Question: This person's death is believed to be the only fatality from a stingray ever captured on video.
Hints: This person also supported rugby union, being a fan of the national team, the Wallabies.
An asteroid discovered in 2001 has been named 57567 Crikey in honour of this person and his "signature phrase".
In 1997, while on a fishing trip on the coast of Queensland with his father, this person discovered a new species of turtle.
